tool.name: Fasta Deduplicator
tool.description: removes duplicate sequences from a fasta file
tool.help:
**What it does**
Say you generated a bunch of SNPs and then translated that data, and found a large number didn't cause missense mutations. You might want to de-duplicate that to reduce the number of sequences:
::
>test ATGC >test2 ATGC >test3 AAAA
will be reduced to
::
>test test [Ident: test2] ATGC >test3 AAAA
